text: Pearl Krabs is one of the ten main characters of SpongeBob SquarePants. She is a pufferfish (also called a blowfish) who is SpongeBob's teacher. She works at an underwater driving school called Mrs. Puff's Boating School. She is voiced by Mary Jo Catlett. ==Fictional biography== Mrs. Puff is paranoid and easily scared. She wears a blue sailor hat and a yellow wig. SpongeBob really wants to pass Mrs. Puff's class, but he always fails his driving test. ==References== Category:SpongeBob SquarePants characters Category:Anthromophic characters Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1999
title: Mrs. Puff
